hero.title: What We Do
hero.subtitle: Comprehensive water and sewerage services ensuring clean water supply and efficient wastewater management for Karachi.

cards.title: Water Supply Services
cards.summary: Reliable clean water distribution across Karachi.
cards.description: Reliable clean water distribution across Karachi.

details.heading: Water Supply Services
details.body: KW&SC sources water from multiple locations including Hub Dam, Keenjhar Lake, and other strategic water sources to ensure adequate supply for Karachi's growing population.

details.heading: Water Filtration Process
details.body: Our state-of-the-art filtration plants ensure that water meets international quality standards before distribution to consumers.

details.heading: Sewerage Infrastructure
details.body: Comprehensive sewerage network covering residential, commercial, and industrial areas across Karachi.

details.heading: Sewerage Treatment
details.body: Advanced treatment plants ensure proper processing of wastewater before disposal, protecting the environment.

details.heading: Revenue Resource Generation
details.body: Efficient billing system ensuring accurate charges and timely collection of water and sewerage fees.

cards.summary: Efficient wastewater collection and treatment systems.
